title: The Adamantine Forge
content:
High Level area. You can repeat the process from step 1 by inserting a new Mithral Ore. Remember to swap the Mould if you want to create a different Item. See Forged Items for more information.

The Adamantine Forge Notes & Tips

Quick links for the items you can create at the forge are: Adamantine Splint Armour Adamantine Scale Mail Adamantine Shield Adamantine Longsword Adamantine Scimitar Adamantine Mace
